mdRecord.dcterms:title: Le grand triumphe magnificque & resiouissance des Parisiens, de la venue du treschrestien Roy Henry second de ce nom en sa ville de Paris / par F. debez. Auec vne epistre a la Royne
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bez, Ferrand de, d. 1581
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Imprimé a Paris ... par Nicolas Buffet pres le College de Reimes
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Trautz-Bauzonnet. Monogram bookplate of "AA." Handwritten note identifies AA as Alphonse Accdeust (?) and lists other owners, J.L.A. Coste and Fairfax Murray. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 163.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Henry, II, King of France, 1519-1559
France--History--Henry II, 1547-1559
